headline: What can be done to fix Product Hunt?
description:
I have used Product Hunt for years and recently started helping friends launch on there.

There are plenty of posts on here, and other forums that are making visible some of the issues Product Hunt has, particularly around being an echo-chamber, filled with spam / fake accounts and needing a significant amount of marketing for most launches to be considered "successful".

My question is, how can this be fixed?
headline_zh-Hans: 怎样才能解决Product Hunt的问题？
headline_zh-Hant: 怎樣才能解決Product Hunt的問題？
description_zh-Hans:
我使用Product Hunt多年，最近开始帮助朋友们在那里发布产品。

这里有很多帖子，还有其他论坛，这些帖子让人们看到了Product Hunt存在的一些问题，特别是围绕着它是一个回声室，充满了垃圾邮件/虚假账户，并且需要大量的营销才能使大多数发布被认为是"成功"。

我的问题是，如何才能解决这个问题？
description_zh-Hant:
